E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1974
Subject: Progress of Allen Ripley
Dear Sir,
Allen Ripley has nothing more to prove at A Lynchburg Twins!
He has an ERA of 3.31 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1974
Subject: Progress of Fred Kuhaulua
Dear Sir,
Fred Kuhaulua has an ERA of 2.32 at A Lynchburg Twins!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1974
Subject: Progress of Les Rohr
Dear Sir,
Les Rohr is doing pretty good at A Lynchburg Twins!
He has an ERA of 3.86, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1974
Subject: Progress of John Scott
Dear Sir,
John Scott is hitting the ball well at A Lynchburg Twins!
He has an AVG of .296, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
